Name: maximize_story_points_in_sprint
Description: Maximize the total number of story points completed within a single sprint.

Name: minimize_effort_for_features
Description: Minimize the total estimated effort required to complete a set of features in a release.

Name: maximize_priority_of_user_stories
Description: Prioritize user stories with the highest priority value to be worked on first.

Name: minimize_number_of_blockers
Description: Minimize the total count of active blockers during a sprint to ensure smooth progress.

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the team satisfaction score recorded in the sprint retrospective.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the achievement status of the sprint goal to ensure focused delivery of value.

Name: minimize_project_timeline_slippage
Description: Minimize the difference between the planned project_end and the actual completion date.

Name: maximize_feature_stakeholder_relevance
Description: Maximize the selection of features that are most relevant to high-influence stakeholders.

Name: minimize_task_effort_variance
Description: Minimize the difference between estimated task effort and actual effort to improve future estimations.

Name: maximize_velocity_trend
Description: Maximize the positive trend of the team's velocity over several sprints.

Name: maximize_skill_level_on_tasks
Description: Maximize the assignment of tasks to workers with the highest skill level for that task type.
